attributes.action: Request a Review and Amendment to the planning application to the Romany Travellers of Symmonds Lane Yalding Kent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED URGENTLY ASK GORDON BROWN TO HELP THESE PEOPLE PLEASE

These families have lived on this land for many years, they pay council tax and have attended local Schools and Churches. They are good,kind hardworking people, and have been denied the right ti live on their own beutifully tended land because of Racist Bigotry within MaidStone Coincil,
they have denied thse people their home on absolutely ridiculous grounds, they have also implied that they should live on the roadside and have no legal rights.
AGAIN I PLEAD WITH YOU, these are good people plese help them
